name: JEAN-CLAUDE GRAND AM
description: JEAN-CLAUDE GRAND AM, would have been an imaginary duo had they ever banded. The two members would have been Jean-Claude Van Damme (Belgian born martial-art film star) and Jeanne-Claude Denat de Guillebon (1 half of Christo & Jeanne-Claude: artists noted for their large-scale, site-specific environmental installations, often large landmarks and landscape elements wrapped in fabric, including the Wrapped Reichstag). The duo would have sung duet covers such as: (I've) Had The Time of My Life, Easy Lover, Reunited, You've Got a Friend, and who could forget their incredible cover of Islands in the Stream. Oh and they would only sing songs from a 1994 Pontiac Grand Am that was wrapped in boxing glove gauze cloth. What? You don't remember this epic duo? Where have you been?
